FuncDef:
The bind dynamic-pool-server pool-name command configures an address pool server selected for a CGN global dynamic address pool.
The undo bind dynamic-pool-server pool-name command deletes an address pool server selected for a CGN global dynamic address pool.
By default, no address pool server that is selected for the CGN global dynamic address pool is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an IP address pool server.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces. If spaces are used, the string must start and end with double quotation marks (").

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In a CU separation scenario, the bind dynamic-pool-server pool-name command is run in the CGN global dynamic address pool view of a vBRAS-UP to configure an address pool server selected for a CGN global dynamic address pool.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
